repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: It is manuscript of Viṣṇupurāṇa. and it contains Aṃśa 1-6. Last folio is not numbered. Verses have different wording than the Critical edition . After the first blank folio 2 folio recto side blank and 3rd blank folio recto side is empty. 2nd blank folio on the verso there is a list of the chapters as per the sections (Aṃśa). śrīviṣṇupurāṇamaṃśaṃ - 6 prathamamaṃśaṃ - adhyāyaṃ- 22 dvitīyamaṃśaṃ- adhyāyaṃ- 16 tṛtīyāmaṃśaṃ - adhyāyaṃ- 17 caturthe aṃśe- adhyāyaṃ- 24 pañcameṃśe aṣṭatriṃśo 38 ṣaṣṭhe aṃśe 7 On 3rd blank folio verso side is written: 1 śrīvatsavaṃśakulaśodadhīpūrṇacandraṃ śrīveṃkaṭākhyayatunāthakṛpaikapātraṃ . śrīrāmadeśika (udātta?) suddhabodhaṃ śrīnivāsarāghavaguruṃ śaraṇaṃ 2 prapadye . vandemadhukaṭanāthākhyayatirājapadāṃbhujaṃ . yatkukṣyaikakalāguṇāṃ sulabhaḥ śrīdarassadā . kalyāṇovabhavatsmākaṃ 3 kārūṇyakalaśāṃbudheḥ prapadye raṃganāthasyapadapaṅkajakalajaṃ .

msItem.title: Viṣṇupurāṇam

filiation.p: VOHD II,7: p:878 entry. 2427 New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 30 pp: 178-180

msItem.incipit: 1v 1 śuklāṃbaradharaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaśivarṇaṃ caturbhujaṃ prasanna vadanam dhyāye sarvavighnopaśāntaye . yasyadviradavaktrādyāḥ pāriṣadyā paraśśataṃ vighnanighnanti sata 1v2 taṃ viṣvaksenaṃ tamāśreye . aṃśeḥ ṣaṭbhiḥ samākīrṇaṃ aṅgairvedairivāparaṃ purāṇaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ cakre yastaṃ vande parāśaraṃ , parāśaraṃ munivaraṃ .parāśaraṃ munivaraṃ 1v 3 kṛtapūrvāhṇikakriyam maitreyaḥ paripapraccha praṇipatyābhivādya ca tvatto hi vedādhyayanam adhītam akhilaṃ guroḥ dharmaśāstrāṇi sarvāṇi 1v 4 tathāṅgāni yathākramam tvatprasādān muniśreṣṭha mām anye nākṛtaśramam.
msItem.explicit: 261r 1 t bahudhaika eva śuddhūvabhāti hi mūrtibhedaiḥ jñātvānvayassakalatattvavibhūtibhartā tasmai nato ’smi puruṣāya sadāvyayāya jñānapravṛttiniyamai 261r 2 kyamayāya puṃso bhogapradānapaṭave triguṇātmakāya avyākṛtāya vibhavā

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration in the left margin on the verso of the folio.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ śūbhamastu is written on 1v in the left margin.

listBibl.bibl: Verses have different wording than the Critical edition. The Critical Edition of the Viṣṇupurāṇam, critically edited by M. M. Pathak. Vadodara : Oriental Institute 1997-1999. Available on Gretil.

encodingDesc.p: Space is added to separate words.
